    public class VigenerCipher
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cipher
    Class Allows you to encrypt and decrypt messages using a cipher Vigener Cipher About cipher: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vigen%C3%A8re_cipher

    1.0
